project.name: NCPCompatCBDev
project.description:
Compatibility for the development version (latest of the supported Minecraft versions).
To add a new compat module the pom.xml file within NCPCompatNonFree has to be modified: - Add as module within the profile with id 'all'. - Add as dependency within the profile with id 'all'. - (Add a new profile with both the module and dependency set.)
The NCPPlugin sub-project contains the relevant factories (MCAccessFactory, EntityAccessFactory, AttributeAccessFactory).
